about_the_game:
Wolf or Boy is a simulation game in which you can experience a physiological battle between humans and werewolves.
Hearing a rumor that horrible murders are repeated in a village in the middle of nowhere, you decide to visit the site.
Apparently, how they got killed is not a human beings doing. There are werewolves amongst the villagers...
"Find out who are the werewolves and kill them!"
"We shall devour all of you, humans!"
"Who are your allies? Who are your enemies?"
You have to fight through a fierce psychological battle with your reliable partner.
You've got to survive the battle by making use of your partner's ability.

Features of this game


  • This game is based on the popular table game "Are You a Werewolf?"
  • You and the rest of the participatants bring his or her partner to the game.
  • Each partner can use a unique ability which can be used to determine who are werewolves or protect yourself against their attacks.
  • Your partner can become better at executing this ability as you win more battles.
  • You are free to customize your partner's character.
    Your partner's age, hairstyle, clothes, voice, relationships, etc. will be in the way you want your partner to be!
    Create your own story with your own partner.
  • You don't know how the story runs every time you play, and you can enjoy playing the unique game forever!

content_descriptors.notes: In this game, there are illustrations with moderate amount of blood.
